example.code: Amazon.DirectoryService.Model.Tag = New-Object Amazon.DirectoryService.Model.Tag Amazon.DirectoryService.Model.Tag.Key = "myTag" Amazon.DirectoryService.Model.Tag.Value = "myTagValue" Add-DSResourceTag -ResourceId d-123456ijkl -Tag Amazon.DirectoryService.Model.Tag
example.description: This command adds the Tag for specified Directory.
